results.description: Sophie Hahn breaks her own world record to win a fourth consecutive T38 100m title at the World Para-Athletics Championships.
results.shortTitle: Hahn wins 100m gold in new world record
results.title: World Para-Athletics Championships: Sophie Hahn wins T38 100m gold with new world record

thumbnail.altText: Sophie Hahn wins the T38 100m final at the World Para-Athletics Championships

results.description: Ireland's Jason Smyth will aim to continue his unbeaten Paralympic career at the World Para-Athletics Championship in Dubai on Wednesday.
results.shortTitle: Smyth favourite for eighth world title
results.title: Jason Smyth: Irish sprinter aims to secure eighth World Para-Athletics title

results.description: Kadeena Cox says being at the World Para-Athletics Championships in Dubai, where she won a silver medal on Monday, has triggered a relapse of her eating disorder.

results.title: World Para-Athletics Championships: Kadeena Cox says Worlds triggered eating disorder

results.description: Britain's Hollie Arnold wins her fourth consecutive F46 javelin world title as team-mate Jonathan Broom-Edwards takes his first in the T64 high jump in Dubai.
results.shortTitle: Arnold and Broom-Edwards win gold in Dubai
results.title: World Para-Athletics Championships: Britons Hollie Arnold and Jonathan Broom-Edwards win gold

results.description: Hollie Arnold says she would love to regain her world record as she targets a fourth consecutive world title.

results.description: Hannah Cockroft says she thought she "might as well be in Yorkshire" after winning the T34 100m gold medal at the World Para-Athletics Championships in an unusually rainy Dubai.

results.description: Seven months after welcoming her son via emergency caesarean, Libby Clegg will compete at the World Para-Athletics Championships.
